comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: A Cierva Autogiro was shipped over to Pitcairn in Philadelphia in Autumn 1928 www.flightglobal.com/pdfarchive/view/1929/1929%20-%200439... however this one wasn't registered until 1929 according to: www.caa.co.uk/application.aspx?catid=60&pagetype=65&a...

comment.author: 113732787@N08
comment._content: Pitcairn Aviation was located in Horsham Township, PA - about 15 miles north of center city Philadelphia.  The Pitcairn facility later became Willow Grove NAS and later Willow Grove Joint Reserve Base.  The installation closed in 2011 and is most of its land is in the process of being transferred to local authorities.
